notes: Tailwind v4 CSS-based config used (@theme inline in globals.css)
All copy loaded from COPY_OUTPUT.json via src/lib/copy.ts — no hardcoded strings
Cookie banner text from COMPLIANCE_OUTPUT.json, with accept/decline actions
PayPal disclosure text from COMPLIANCE_OUTPUT.json included in DonatePanel
Middleware warning: Next.js 16 deprecates middleware in favor of proxy — works but shows warning
Merch items use placeholder data (emoji + name/price) since COPY_OUTPUT has no product items
Static pages generated for all 3 locales
